meta.description: A knowledgeable pet owner insists on antibody titer tests to measure pet's immunity to disease, and opt out of unnecessary, potentially risky re-vaccinations.

title: Pet Immunization Is Far Riskier Than You Might Think
cleaned_text: August is National Immunization Awareness Month, and while the goal of the traditional veterinary community is to promote pet vaccinations, it’s important for pet guardians to understand the difference between “vaccination” and “immunization”

opengraph.title: Pet Immunization Is Far Riskier Than You Might Think
opengraph.description: A knowledgeable pet owner insists on antibody titer tests to measure pet's immunity to disease, and opt out of unnecessary, potentially risky re-vaccinations.
